definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Unfortunately, however, of great luck, it's been non-circulating Rubbings .

sentences.english: As the original trail has not existed for a long time, the researchers mostly use the tablet rubbings as their basis.

definition: a rubbing from a stone inscription
authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)
manuscript (of a book etc)/sketch (of a design etc)
to record/to put down in writing
early form of Chinese characters inscribed in stone, a precursor of the small seal 小篆[xiao3 zhuan4]
